mapper.insert: insert into user(userid, userpw, username, gender, birth, email, userphone, nickname, zipcode, addr, addrdetail, addretc) values(#{userid},#{userpw},#{username}, #{gender},#{birth}, #{email}, #{userphone}, #{nickname}, #{zipcode}, #{addr},#{addrdetail},#{addretc})
mapper.select: select userid from user where email=#{email}
